QuestData.Title: The Klaxxi Council
QuestData.Description: I must report to the Klaxxi. They would not have woken me unless the situation were dire.$B$BYou have not been entirely useless. For that, I will spare your life.$B$BThe council may even find a use for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Klaxxi'vess at the center of the Dread Wastes. You may speak with Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver in the Terrace of Gurthan for a ride, or travel on your own.
QuestData.RewardText: This is a sacred meeting place for the Klaxxi.$B$BIt would be wise of you to let me do the talking.
